EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Nicholas, As we discussed, here is a link from the AICPA (the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants) that describes how dividends are no longer a tax shelter for Corporations. http://www.cpa2biz.com/Content/media/PRODUCER_CONTENT/Newsletters/Articles_2012/CorpTax/2013TaxChangesPlanning.jsp <http://www.cpa2biz.com/Content/media/PRODUCER_CONTENT/Newsletters/Articles_2012/CorpTax/2013TaxChangesPlanning.jsp> “As of Jan. 1, 2013, qualified dividends will be subject to ordinary income tax rates (an increase from 15% to up to 43.4% (including the new 3.8% Medicare tax).
